bountiful-bush-fertilizer.description: Your bushes will produce like they've never done before!
bountiful-bush-fertilizer.name: Bountiful Bush Fertilizer.
bountiful-fertilizer.description: Use may double the number of crops received at harvest.
bountiful-fertilizer.name: Bountiful Fertilizer
deluxe-fish-food.description: Quite good at attracting fish. Lasts for a few days. Toss into water
deluxe-fish-food.name: Deluxe Fish Food
deluxe-fruit-tree-fertilizer.description: Guaranteed to make your fruit trees grow rapidly!
deluxe-fruit-tree-fertilizer.name: Deluxe Fruit Tree Fertilizer
domesticated-fish-food.description: Makes your domesticated fish grow faster!
domesticated-fish-food.name: Domesticated Fish Food
everlasting-fertilizer.description: Claims to let your plants survive out of season. You can feel a strange energy radiating from this fertilizer.
everlasting-fertilizer.name: Everlasting Fertilizer
everlasting-fruittree-fertilizer.descrip: Allows your fruit trees to produce out of season. Might not be safe.
everlasting-fruittree-fertilizer.name: Everlasting Fruit Tree Fertilizer.
fish-food.description: Apparently fish like this? Attracts fish when tossed in the water.
fish-food.name: Fish Food
fruit-tree-fertilizer.description: Makes fruit trees grow faster. Best not ask too many questions.
fruit-tree-fertilizer.name: Fruit Tree Fertilizer
good-luck-fertilizer.description: Proudly in production for 50+ years! Promises to keep your crops safe from crows and lighting.
good-luck-fertilizer.name: Maeby's Good-Luck Fertilizer.
joja-fertilizer.name: Joja's Patented Fertilizer.
joja-fertilizer-deluxe.description: Significantly more expensive than the Patented Fertilizer and even more guaranteed.
joja-fertilizer-deluxe.name: Joja's Deluxe Fertilizer
miraculous-beverages.description: Makes....beverages appear? What? How does this even work?
miraculous-beverages.name: Fertilizer of Miraculous Beverages
organic-fertilizer.description: You're not quite sure what it does, but organic crops always sell for higher prices...
organic-fertilizer.name: Organic Fertilizer
prismatic-fertilizer.description: The label simply says: 'Ohhhh! Pretty colors!'.
prismatic-fertilizer.name: Prismatic Fertilizer
radioactive-fertilizer.description: Are you sure this is a good idea?
radioactive-fertilizer.name: Radioactive Fertilizer
rapid-bush-fertilizer.name: Murph's Quik-Grow-Bush Fertilizer
secret-joja-fertilizer.description: Joja's scientists have been keeping this one under wraps for some reason.
secret-joja-fertilizer.name: Joja's Secret Fertilizer
seedy-fertilizer.name: Seedy Fertilizer
tree-tapper.name: Tree Tapper's Fertilizer
waterlogged-fertilizer.description: Retains water so well, anywhere can be a paddy! (for paddy crops only)
waterlogged-fertilizer.name: Waterlogged Fertilizer
wisdom-fertilizer.description: Promises to make you wiser. Are you sure this isn't a scam?
wisdom-fertilizer.name: Wisdom Fertilizer
